universities.name: Addis Ababa University
universities.description: The oldest and largest university in Ethiopia, offering a wide range of programs.
generalRequirements: Satisfactory score on the Ethiopian University Entrance Examination
Specific requirements may vary by program

departments.name: College of Health Sciences
departments.description: Dedicated to advancing health through education, research, and service.

programs.name: Doctor of Medicine (MD)
programs.description: A comprehensive program to train future medical professionals.

programs.name: Bachelor of Science in Nursing
programs.description: Focuses on providing high-quality nursing care and leadership.

departments.description: Committed to excellence in engineering education and research.

programs.description: Deals with the theory and application of computation and computer technology.
